Package com.devcharles.piazzapanic.utility

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CookAnimator
    Animations specific to the cooks.
    CustomerAnimator
    Animations specific to the customers.
    EntityFactory
    Factory pattern class that creates entities used in the game.
    FoodStack  
    GdxTimer
    Simple timer class suitable for this project.
    MapLoader
    Loads and owns the TiledMap object.
    Mappers
    Static class, holds all the ComponentMapper instances we need, as there is no reason to have multiple instaces of a ComponentMapper.
    Pair<K,​V>
    Create a generic tuple.
    Station
    Helper class for storing station recipes and Station.StationType of the current station.
    WalkAnimator
    Abstract class that helps with setting up animations for characters in the game.
    WorldTilemapRenderer
    Renders a TiledMap that is loaded using MapLoader.
    YComparator
    Compares entities by their Y coordinate, so entities that are lower on the screen appear in front for a consistent perspective.
    ZComparator
    Compares the entities by their Z coordinate.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Station.itemDisplayDir
    Named enumeration of the item display directions.
    Station.StationType
    Named enumeration of the station types.
    WalkAnimator.Direction
    All directions that the animations support.
